com.google.android.exoplayer

Class SampleHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.SampleHolder

  • public final class SampleHolder
extends Object
    Holds sample data and corresponding metadata.

      • flags

        public int flags
        Flags that accompany the sample. A combination of C.SAMPLE_FLAG_SYNC, C.SAMPLE_FLAG_ENCRYPTED and C.SAMPLE_FLAG_DECODE_ONLY.

      • timeUs

        public long timeUs
        The time at which the sample should be presented.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SampleHolder

        public SampleHolder(int bufferReplacementMode)
        Parameters:
        bufferReplacementMode - Determines the behavior of ensureSpaceForWrite(int). One of BUFFER_REPLACEMENT_MODE_DISABLED, BUFFER_REPLACEMENT_MODE_NORMAL and BUFFER_REPLACEMENT_MODE_DIRECT.

    • Method Detail

      • ensureSpaceForWrite

        public void ensureSpaceForWrite(int length)
                         throws IllegalStateException
        Ensures that data is large enough to accommodate a write of a given length at its current position.

        If the capacity of data is sufficient this method does nothing. If the capacity is insufficient then an attempt is made to replace data with a new ByteBuffer whose capacity is sufficient. Data up to the current position is copied to the new buffer.

        Parameters:
        length - The length of the write that must be accommodated, in bytes.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If there is insufficient capacity to accommodate the write and the buffer replacement mode of the holder is BUFFER_REPLACEMENT_MODE_DISABLED.

      • isEncrypted

        public boolean isEncrypted()
        Returns whether flags has C.SAMPLE_FLAG_ENCRYPTED set.

      • isDecodeOnly

        public boolean isDecodeOnly()
        Returns whether flags has C.SAMPLE_FLAG_DECODE_ONLY set.

      • isSyncFrame

        public boolean isSyncFrame()
        Returns whether flags has C.SAMPLE_FLAG_SYNC set.

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        Clears data. Does nothing if data is null.
